creator: Asite Solutions Limited
descriptionHtml:
Adoddle Field is an easy-to-use tool which enables seamless project collaboration on the move. Sign in with your Adoddle account to access your tasks, files of any type, forms, models and defects. Publish and share drawings, photos, and files and maintain access to the latest project information. Adoddle Field is graphically improved, with many exciting new features.

Collaborate with project teams using instant messaging / group messaging via aMessages without reference of any file. Share files via drag and drop and maintain an audit trail. Easily track work, without emails or spreadsheets and manage tasks with or without reference to files.

Mark-up documents and drawings and issue tasks to team members, allowing you to stay on top of time-critical review processes. View and mark-up Building Information Models (BIM) in 3D, and drill down into the components of the model to review discipline-specific elements.
Adoddle Field enables you to view and review multiple model files from disparate BIM Authoring toolsets merged into one unified model in Adoddle cBIM in the cloud. Raise RFIs, Defects / Punch-lists, or any of the hundreds of other project workflow forms available in the Adoddle App Library and issue them to team members directly from your device with direct links to the relevant parts of any file or model. The Adoddle platform maintains a full and complete audit trail of all communications as a project progresses. Get notified automatically when tasks are performed on a file or a folder.
Simplified Start / Stop watch functions are available for notifications to be issued online, via email, or in Adoddle Field.
Auto synchronization of files from web and field to update documents and drawings. Allow user to manage the defects on the site along with the location, GPS tracker and defect picture attachment.

Key Features:
· Collaborate with project teams using instant messaging / group messaging via aMessages without the need to reference any files / Apps.
· Attach files and share via drag and drop.
· Easily track your work, without emails or spreadsheets and manage tasks with or without ref to any file.
· Unlimited task management capabilities.
· Create project workflow forms such as RFIs, Defects / Punch lists via simple Adoddle forms.
· Manage unlimited folders and files.
· View over 300 different file formats directly on your device with no other software required.
· Auto Synchronize new files when uploaded in the Web Application (when scheduled).
· 3D view of BIM Model files.
· Merge and view multiple BIM model files merged into one unified project model.
· Mark-up drawings, documents, photos, and BIM models in the field.
· Complete Quality Assurance and Compliance forms while in the field.
· Full Audit Trail.

About Asite
Asite helps people share information and build knowledge in a secure environment in the cloud. Every day, people all over the world use our Adoddle platform to manage their projects and supply chains collaboratively to get the information they need – when and where they need it.
Organizations use Adoddle to go paperless, reduce their carbon footprint and reduce IT emissions. Adoddle also helps companies to measure and track their projects, sustainability initiatives and to share and learn best practices.

Asite have their Head Office based in London’s tech-city, as well as regional offices in North America, Australia, India, UAE and South Africa.

If you have any queries, please get in touch at http://www.asite.com/contactus
descriptionShort: Stay connected to your data on Asite no matter where your work takes you.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Introducing the ability to create any Form on a Calibrated Drawing with Field Management

Extended support on AppBuilder designed forms to associate locations to any Form Type

Improved view of calibrated plans with separate pins for Defects and other Site Task forms

General bug fixes and performance improvements

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Support extended for viewing 2D files offline on your device without the native application. [Supported for Universal Web Viewer (UWV) projects only.]
- Defects tab renamed to 'Sites' as it now covers site related forms.
- Thumbnail view of attachments for Site forms
- Batch status change function extended for all Site forms
- Introducing Site app for logging Defect, Punch list, Issues and etc, similar to Defects.

The Adoddle platform maintains a full and complete audit trail of all communications as a project progresses. Get notified automatically when tasks are performed on a file or a folder.
Simplified Start / Stop watch functions are available for notifications to be issued online, via email, or in Adoddle Field.
Auto synchronization of files from web and field to update documents and drawings. Allow user to manage the defects on the site along with the location, GPS tracker and defect picture attachment.

Key Features:
· Collaborate with project teams using instant messaging / group messaging via aMessages without the need to reference any files / Apps.
· Attach files and share via drag and drop.
· Easily track your work, without emails or spreadsheets and manage tasks with or without ref to any file.
· Unlimited task management capabilities.
· Create project workflow forms such as RFIs, Defects / Punch lists via simple Adoddle forms.
· Manage unlimited folders and files.
· View over 300 different file formats directly on your device with no other software required.
· Auto Synchronize new files when uploaded in the Web Application (when scheduled).
· 3D view of BIM Model files.
· Merge and view multiple BIM model files merged into one unified project model.
· Mark-up drawings, documents, photos, and BIM models in the field.
· Complete Quality Assurance and Compliance forms while in the field.
· Full Audit Trail.

About Asite
Asite helps people share information and build knowledge in a secure environment in the cloud. Every day, people all over the world use our Adoddle platform to manage their projects and supply chains collaboratively to get the information they need – when and where they need it.
Organizations use Adoddle to go paperless, reduce their carbon footprint and reduce IT emissions. Adoddle also helps companies to measure and track their projects, sustainability initiatives and to share and learn best practices.

Asite have their Head Office based in London’s tech-city, as well as regional offices in North America, Australia, India, UAE and South Africa.

If you have any queries, please get in touch at http://www.asite.com/contactus

title: Adoddle Field

creator: Asite Solutions Limited
descriptionHtml:
Developed by Asite Solutions Ltd, Adoddle Field for Site ensures that those working on-site have access to the latest project information, both online and offline, using the mobile and tablet app.
Project teams can efficiently create, view, and manage site tasks – such as defects, punch lists, and snags – using mobile/tablet devices. The application allows users to pin forms to locations on the project sitemap, allowing for accurate reporting and clarity on where issues have occurred on site.
The Asite Platform and Adoddle Field for Site work hand-in-hand to guarantee that all changes are seamlessly and automatically synchronized with the Asite Common Data Environment (CDE).
Key Features include:
- Simplistic and easy-to-navigate user interface
- Site Dashboards providing key statistics in graphic formats
- Access to CDE module to comment, mark-up drawings, and change task statuses in just a couple of taps
- Instantly track, raise and complete tasks when on the move
- Build, manage and track customized project forms, including Quality or HSE information
- View, create and comment on information in an offline environment
- Full audit trail of all communications and changes
- Navigate around 3D model files and create comments & views
descriptionShort: Stay connected to your data on Asite no matter where your work takes you.

title: Adoddle Field

creator: Asite Solutions Limited
descriptionHtml:
Developed by Asite Solutions Ltd, Adoddle Field for Site ensures that those working on-site have access to the latest project information, both online and offline, using the mobile and tablet app.
Project teams can efficiently create, view, and manage site tasks – such as defects, punch lists, and snags – using mobile/tablet devices. The application allows users to pin forms to locations on the project sitemap, allowing for accurate reporting and clarity on where issues have occurred on site.
The Asite Platform and Adoddle Field for Site work hand-in-hand to guarantee that all changes are seamlessly and automatically synchronized with the Asite Common Data Environment (CDE).
Key Features include:
- Simplistic and easy-to-navigate user interface
- Site Dashboards providing key statistics in graphic formats
- Access to CDE module to comment, mark-up drawings, and change task statuses in just a couple of taps
- Instantly track, raise and complete tasks when on the move
- Build, manage and track customized project forms, including Quality or HSE information
- View, create and comment on information in an offline environment
- Full audit trail of all communications and changes
- Navigate around 3D model files and create comments & views
descriptionShort: Stay connected to your data on Asite no matter where your work takes you.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Quality Plan improvements:
The Quality Plan Module has now been improved to allow Quality Managers to alter the setting of the quality plan in the WebApp. As part of the configuration, you can now edit the activity title, adjust the order/sequence, and related folder/form for any activity.

Field users can now view the updated quality plan and operate more efficiently with the most recent version while working on their devices.

-General bug fixes and performance optimization.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Quick export of Quality Plan into Excel Spreadsheet

Users of Asite Field can now enjoy exporting in-progress or finalized Quality Test Plans into an Excel format. You can now instantly download a project’s quality management progress on your local device, for sharing with project stakeholders or data processing purposes.

Profile Editing for Language and Time-zone

Language and Time-zone configuration is now possible within the Asite Field application

The application allows users to pin forms to locations on the project sitemap, allowing for accurate reporting and clarity on where issues have occurred on site.
The Asite Platform and Adoddle Field for Site work hand-in-hand to guarantee that all changes are seamlessly and automatically synchronized with the Asite Common Data Environment (CDE).
Key Features include:
- Simplistic and easy-to-navigate user interface
- Site Dashboards providing key statistics in graphic formats
- Access to CDE module to comment, mark-up drawings, and change task statuses in just a couple of taps
- Instantly track, raise and complete tasks when on the move
- Build, manage and track customized project forms, including Quality or HSE information
- View, create and comment on information in an offline environment
- Full audit trail of all communications and changes
- Navigate around 3D model files and create comments & views
descriptionShort: Stay connected to your data on Asite no matter where your work takes you.
